sentences.en: $50,000? I don’t know. I’m only hazarding a guess.
sentences.cn: 5万美元？我不知道，我只是瞎猜。

sentences.en: A new report suggests that chewing-gum may be a health hazard.
sentences.cn: 一份新报告指出，口香糖可能对健康有害。

sentences.en: As to the author of the book, I will hazard a guess.
sentences.cn: 关于这本书的作者, 我来试猜一下.

sentences.en: But an All Risk policy covers every sort of hazard, doesn't it?
sentences.cn: 一份综合保险单保所有的险, 是不是 啊 ?

sentences.en: Careless drivers hazard other people's lives as well as their own.
sentences.cn: 粗心大意的驾驶者拿他人和自己的生命冒险。

sentences.en: Catching colds is unfortunately an occupational hazard in this profession.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，容易感冒是这个行业的职业性风险。

sentences.en: He climbed into the car at the hazard of his life.
sentences.cn: 他冒着生命危险进了汽车.

sentences.en: He had a life full of hazard.
I think we have provided for every possible hazard.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们已经准备好了应付每一种可能的危险.

sentences.en: I would hazard a guess that they'll do fairly well in the next election.
sentences.cn: 我斗胆猜测，他们在下一轮竞选中会有不错的表现。

sentences.en: Oil leaking from a barge in the Mississippi River poses a hazard to the drinking water of New Orleans.
sentences.cn: 密西西比河上驳船漏油事件危及新奥尔良市的饮用水。

sentences.en: Polluted water sources are a hazard to wildlife.
sentences.cn: 受污染的水源会对野生生物构成危险。

sentences.en: Poverty leads to slums, which are an eyesore and a health hazard.
sentences.cn: 贫困产生了贫民窟，那里不仅有碍观瞻，而且卫生隐患严重。

sentences.en: Rock - climbers sometimes hazard their lives.
sentences.cn: 攀岩者有时冒着生命危险.

sentences.en: That pile of rubbish is a fire hazard (= something that is likely to cause a fire ).
The recent outbreaks of cholera are a timely reminder that this disease is still a serious health hazard.
sentences.cn: 最近霍乱的爆发及时提醒了人们该疾病仍然会严重危害健康。

sentences.en: They have not used this article before, but they are willing to hazard a try.
sentences.cn: 这种商品他们以前从未用过, 但愿意尝试一次.

sentences.en: To guard against this hazard, officials enforced elaborate fire precautions.
sentences.cn: 为防止这种危险, 官员们采取各种细致的防火措施.

sentences.en: Well, we can hazard a guess at the answer.
sentences.cn: 噢，我们可以猜一猜答案。

words.tran_cn: 有危险的；冒险的；碰运气的
赌运气；冒…的危险，使遭受危险

phrases.tran_cn: 冒一切危险；不惜任何代价
危险标志；危害鉴定；灾难识别
道德危机；由于投保人可能不可靠所冒的风险
n. 潜在危险，潜在危害

trans.tran_cn: 危险，冒险的事，机会，双骰子游戏
trans.tran_en: something that may be dangerous, or cause accidents or problems
something that may be dangerous, or cause accidents or problems

trans.tran_cn: 赌运气；冒…的危险，使遭受危险
trans.tran_en: to risk losing your money, property etc in an attempt to gain something
to risk losing your money, property etc in an attempt to gain something
